decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 29KR_Location and Block Plan_P00, 29KR_P_Location and Block Plan_P00, 29KR_EE02_P00 (Existing Rear Elevation), 29KR_EE03_P00 (Existing Side Elevation), 29KR_EP00_P00 (Existing Ground Floor Plan), 29KR_PP00_P00 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan), 29KR_PE02_P00 (Proposed Rear Elevation), 29KR_PE03_P00 (Proposed Side Elevation), Fire Safety Statement dated March 2023, Parking Provision Details dated March 2023, Heritage Statement dated March 2023, Design and Access Statement dated March 2023.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall be as per the submitted application form or approved drawings (Condition 2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.18), policies D3 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - sections 12 and 16.
description: Alterations to ground floor rear/side elevation, changes to existing openings to install timber framed double glazed doors and windows
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
